name: bj-ax12wlem
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(w2, wal(s0, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, wi(w0, w1))))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

comment: A lemma used to prove a weak version of the axiom of substitution ~ ax-12 . (Temporary comment: The general statement that ~ ax12wlem proves.) (Contributed by BJ, 20-Mar-2020.)
